scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a chaotic battle with numerous armored figures on horseback and on foot, engaged in combat. A white horse is central, with a rider in blue armor being pulled down by another figure. To the right, a kingly figure in a blue surcoat adorned with gold embroidery, wearing a crown, surveys the scene, holding a shield. Several fallen soldiers and a severed head are visible on the green ground, suggesting a violent conflict. The background is filled with more soldiers and horses, and the sky is a pale blue.
